Class CascadeAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • protopeer.BasePeerlet
      • core.SFINAAgent
        • applications.BenchmarkSFINAAgent
          • applications.CascadeAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationAgentInterface, protopeer.Peerlet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BenchmarkDomainAgent

    public class CascadeAgent
extends BenchmarkSFINAAgent
    Cascade if link limits violated. Domain independent.

    • Method Detail

      • runAnalysis

        public void runAnalysis()
        Implements cascade as a result of overloaded links. Continues until system stabilizes, i.e. no more link overloads occur. Calls mitigateOverload method before finally calling linkOverload method, therefore mitigation strategies can be implemented.
        Specified by:
        runAnalysis in interface SimulationAgentInterface
        Overrides:
        runAnalysis in class SFINAAgent
